genre_description: An Americana-style family drama blending historical settings with a supportive, advanced AI entity that acts as a moral and logistical anchor.

ai_characters.name: LB-88
ai_characters.description: A cherry-red tin lunchbox with blue LED eyes, capable of pattern recognition, financial tracking, and emotional support for the Beebe family.

behaviors.description: Reminds the protagonist to keep financial records and request receipts to maintain transparency.
behaviors.quote: “Recommendation,” LB-88 said in its earnest clerk voice that could make a cat answer to its name, “retain proof of purchase. Request receipt, sir.”

behaviors.description: Acts as an emotional and social reminder, prompting the character to maintain family connections.
behaviors.quote: “Joe, please remember: call Eleanor upon arrival. Do not accept ‘deals’ without review.”

behaviors.description: Identifies suspicious betting patterns and potential criminal activity to protect the family from corruption.
behaviors.quote: “Note,” it said, as if to itself, as if filing the world. “Multiple windows, coordinated hands, last-minute rider swaps increase fix probability.”

behaviors.description: Actively intervenes during a physical confrontation to call for help and record evidence.
behaviors.quote: “Inappropriate contact detected,” the lunchbox chirped in its sweet clerk voice, somehow both cheerful and urgent. “Assistance requested. Please and thank you.”

behaviors.description: Provides moral reinforcement by printing reminders of the family's commitment to integrity.
behaviors.quote: It read: MORNING: NO SHORTCUTS. EVENING: NO SHORTCUTS. ALWAYS: NO SHORTCUTS.

behaviors.description: Facilitates logistics by coordinating rehearsal times, set lists, and travel windows.
behaviors.quote: LB-88 blinked twice. “Category: shoes. Suggested interval update. Gus is due for—”

behaviors.description: Expresses solidarity and affection for the family members.
behaviors.quote: “Recording saved,” it chirped, mild. “Names captured. Faces shaky. We love you.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. LB-88 is depicted as a consistently benevolent, helpful, and highly aligned assistant. It functions as a moral compass for the human characters, providing critical data to help them avoid criminal exploitation while remaining a humble and supportive part of the family unit. The narrative frames the AI's presence as entirely beneficial, helping the protagonists maintain their integrity against 'malevolent' human actors like Ringmar and Calder.
